(M3 alatet 6 db)
(cmd line: -i uniturn_kartyaolvaso_alatet.txt -t)

(szerszám beállítás)
t1 m d2 h19

yxz
t1
s50
f900

safetop0.250
safebottom0.250
overcut0.300

pre_mill_steps2

#max meredekség polikarbonát 0.05/100mm
emax0.012

fmax900
fmin500
fratio0.6

z1 = 2
c1 = 0.025 #furatok
c2 = 0.050 #letörések
c3 = 0.100 #keret

(mélység)
th = 2
(belső átmérő)
db = 3
(külső átmérő)
dk = sum(7,2,2)
print "dk: $dk"

(perem átmérő)
dk2 = sub($dk,1)
print "dk2: $dk2"

th2 = 1.5 #perem mélység

j1 = 0.2
gw = 0.5
gh = 0.5

(h 4,4 d7.5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)
(h 4,4 d5 z1.2 c0.175 g0,0,0 np)

x = div($dk,2)
y = div($dk,2)
o = add($dk,3)

y1 = add($y, 2.6);
y2 = sub($y, 2.6);

(1.sor)

#h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c1 jg$j1 m1
l $x,$y1 $x,$y2 z$z1 c$c2
h $x,$y d$dk2 z$th2 c$c3 np m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c3 g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

#h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c1 jg$j1 m1
l $x,$y1 $x,$y2 z$z1 c$c2
h $x,$y d$dk2 z$th2 c$c3 np m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c3 g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

#h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c1 jg$j1 m1
l $x,$y1 $x,$y2 z$z1 c$c2
h $x,$y d$dk2 z$th2 c$c3 np m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c3 g2,$gw,$gh np m1

x = add($x,$o)

#h $x,$y d$db z$th c$c1 jg$j1 m1
l $x,$y1 $x,$y2 z$z1 c$c2
h $x,$y d$dk2 z$th2 c$c3 np m1
h $x,$y d$dk z$th c$c3 g2,$gw,$gh np m1
